name: app
description: Lookup an App by ID or return the currently authenticated App.

arguments.name: id
arguments.description: The ID to lookup the App by.

returns.name: apiKey
returns.description: A unique application API identifier.

returns.name: appStoreAppUrl
returns.description: App store page URL of the app.

returns.name: appStoreDeveloperUrl
returns.description: App store page URL of the developer who created the app.

returns.name: availableAccessScopes
returns.description: All requestable access scopes available to the app.

returns.name: banner
returns.description: Banner image for the app.

returns.name: description
returns.description: Description of the app.

returns.name: developerName
returns.description: The name of the app developer.

returns.name: developerType
returns.description: The type of app developer.

returns.name: developerUrl
returns.description: Website of the developer who created the app.

returns.name: embedded
returns.description: Whether the app uses the Embedded App SDK.

returns.name: failedRequirements
returns.description: Requirements that must be met before the app can be installed.

returns.name: features
returns.description: A list of app features that are shown in the Shopify App Store listing.

returns.name: feedback
returns.description: Feedback from this app about the store.

returns.name: handle
returns.description: Handle of the app.

returns.name: icon
returns.description: Icon that represents the app.

returns.name: id
returns.description: A globally-unique ID.

returns.name: installUrl
returns.description: Webpage where you can install the app.

returns.name: installation
returns.description: Corresponding AppInstallation for this shop and App. Returns null if the App is not installed.

returns.name: isPostPurchaseAppInUse
returns.description: Whether the app is the post purchase app in use.

returns.name: launchUrl
returns.description: Webpage that the app starts in.

returns.name: navigationItems
returns.description: Menu items for the app, which also appear as submenu items in left navigation sidebar in the Shopify admin.

returns.name: optionalAccessScopes
returns.description: The optional scopes requested by the app. Lists the optional access scopes the app has declared in its configuration. These scopes are optionally requested by the app after installation.

returns.name: previouslyInstalled
returns.description: Whether the app was previously installed on the current shop.

returns.name: pricingDetails
returns.description: Detailed information about the app pricing.

returns.name: pricingDetailsSummary
returns.description: Summary of the app pricing details.

returns.name: privacyPolicyUrl
returns.description: Link to app privacy policy.

returns.name: publicCategory
returns.description: The public category for the app.

returns.name: published
returns.description: Whether the app is published to the Shopify App Store.

returns.name: requestedAccessScopes
returns.description: The access scopes requested by the app. Lists the access scopes the app has declared in its configuration. Merchant must grant approval to these scopes for the app to be installed.

returns.name: screenshots
returns.description: Screenshots of the app.

returns.name: shopifyDeveloped
returns.description: Whether the app was developed by Shopify.

returns.name: title
returns.description: Name of the app.

returns.name: uninstallMessage
returns.description: Message that appears when the app is uninstalled. For example: By removing this app, you will no longer be able to publish products to MySocialSite or view this app in your Shopify admin. You can re-enable this channel at any time.

returns.name: uninstallUrl
returns.description: Webpage where you can uninstall the app.

returns.name: webhookApiVersion
returns.description: The webhook API version for the app.

examples.description: Get an app by its ID
